pageContent: Toggle Menu Search documentation...Search...⌘K GETTING STARTED INSTALLATION COMPONENTS Docs Breadcrumb BREADCRUMB Displays the path to the current resource using a hierarchy of links. PreviewCode Style: Open in Copy INSTALLATION CLIManual npx shadcn@latest add breadcrumb Copy USAGE import { Breadcrumb, BreadcrumbItem, BreadcrumbLink, BreadcrumbList, BreadcrumbPage, BreadcrumbSeparator, } from "@/components/ui/breadcrumb" Copy Home Components Breadcrumb Copy

EXAMPLES CUSTOM SEPARATOR Use a custom component as children for to create a custom separator. PreviewCode Style: Open in Copy import { Slash } from "lucide-react" ... Home Components Copy DROPDOWN You can compose with a to create a dropdown in the breadcrumb. PreviewCode Style: Open in Copy

import { DropdownMenu, DropdownMenuContent, DropdownMenuItem, DropdownMenuTrigger, } from "@/components/ui/dropdown-menu" ... Components Documentation Themes GitHub Copy COLLAPSED We provide a component to show a collapsed state when the breadcrumb is too long. PreviewCode Style: Open in Copy import { BreadcrumbEllipsis } from "@/components/ui/breadcrumb" ... {/* ... */} {/* ... */} Copy LINK COMPONENT

To use a custom link component from your routing library, you can use the asChild prop on . PreviewCode Style: Open in Copy import { Link } from "next/link" ... Home {/* ... */} Copy RESPONSIVE Here's an example of a responsive breadcrumb that composes with , , and . It displays a dropdown on desktop and a drawer on mobile. PreviewCode Style: Open in Copy On This Page Bring your app built with shadcn to life on Vercel Trusted by OpenAI, Sonos, Chick-fil-A, and more.
